text: ineziya yamenuna yetesededu፡፡ be’alahimi menigedi layi begenizebochachewina benefisochachewi yetagelu፡፡ ineziyami (sidetenyochuni) yasit’eguna yeredu፡፡ ineziya kefilochachewi lekefilu redatochi nachewi፡፡ ineziyami yamenuna yalitesededu isikemisededu diresi kenesu minimi zimidina yelachihumi፡፡ behayimanotimi iridatani bifeligubachihu be’inanitena benesu mekakeli k’ali kidani balachihu hizibochi layi kalihone besitek’eri benanite layi meridati alebachihu፡፡ alahimi yemitiserutini hulu temelikachi newi፡፡
